The Dot

A visual phenomenology extending Basic Design theory

The dot is the simplest form possible and its analytical study opens a gateway to a deeper understanding of the relation between space and form. This research project unfold a theory of visual representations based on the ontological nature of space/form as a singular entity.

The methodology used aims at describing visual phenomena from 4 points of view:
theory - static image - moving image - interaction
